title: [K-12] Virtual Suturing Skill Learning: Comparative Analysis of Oral and Written Feedback Effects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of fundamental surgical equipment usage and suturing techniques
context.additional_context: Conducted in Smartphone-Centric Virtual Learning Environments, Requiring Participants to Possess Basic Surgical Equipment at Home

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic suturing techniques in virtual environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can compare improvements in suturing skills based on verbal/written feedback types
Learners achieve over 20% improvement in suturing technique checklists and GRS scores through pre-post assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
